name: wpframework
description: Custom installer for the SparkSpring WordPress framework

scripts.framework-editor: npm install adm-zip && npm install async && npm install os && npm install ncp && npm install prompt && npm install simple-git && node framework-editor.js && npm install && bower install
scripts.installer: npm install adm-zip && npm install async && npm install os && npm install ncp && npm install prompt && npm install simple-git && node installer.js && npm install && bower install

author: SparkSpring
